text.name: Language
text.tooltip: Change the language of the graphical user interface to

text.name: Load
text.tooltip: Load the files related to an article

text.name: Previous
text.tooltip: Go to the previous article

text.name: Next
text.tooltip: Go to the next article

text.name: Save
text.tooltip: Record the modified text and entities

text.name: Copy
text.tooltip: Save a copy of the reference entities

text.name: ArticleAnnotatedList
text.tooltip: Generate a file listing all annotated articles

text.name: ArticleNonAnnotatedList
text.tooltip: Generate a file listing all articles not annotated yet

text.name: Insert
text.tooltip: Insert or convert an entity of type

text.name: Remove
text.tooltip: Remove an entity

text.name: ShiftLeft
text.tooltip: Left-shift by 1 character all the entities located after the cursor

text.name: ShiftRight
text.tooltip: Right-shift by 1 character all the entities located after the cursor

text.name: Display
text.tooltip: Display/hide entities of type

text.name: ModeTypes
text.tooltip: Display entity types

text.name: ModeComp
text.tooltip: Compare the detected entities to those of the reference

text.name: Links
text.tooltip: Show/Hide the article hyperlinks

text.name: Larger
text.tooltip: Increase the font size

text.name: Smaller
text.tooltip: Decrease the font size

text.name: Corpus
text.tooltip: Change the main folder containing the corpus

text.name: Editor
text.tooltip: Change the name of the person currently editing the article

text.name: LastCorpus
text.tooltip: Try to access the last corpus at startup

text.name: LastArticle
text.tooltip: Try to load the last article at startup

text.name: Editable
text.tooltip: Enable/disable reference text modification

text.name: About
text.tooltip: Display general information about

text.name: Index
text.tooltip: Display basic instructions regarding how to use

text.name: CorpusError
text.tooltip: The selected folder does not contain any article.

text.name: SetCorpus
text.tooltip: No corpus has been set, or the previously set corpus cannot be accessed anymore.

text.name: SetCorpusSelect
text.value: For this reason, you are now going to be asked to select the main folder of the corpus.

text.name: ProposeSaving
text.tooltip: The reference has been modified. Do you want to record these changes?

text.name: Index
text.tooltip: Click OK to close

text.name: ArticleList
text.tooltip: The following file was created:

text.name: ArticleListError
text.tooltip: A problem occured while creating the file:

text.name: LanguageError
text.tooltip: Error while loading the language file

text.name: LanguageErrorEnd
text.value: The previously selected language is therefore kept.

text.name: Restart
text.tooltip: You need to restart the software for the change to become effective.

text.name: ChangeEditor
text.tooltip: Enter the name of the person currently editing entities (i.e. you):

text.name: FirstLaunch
text.tooltip: This is the first launch of

text.name: FirstLaunchAsked
text.value: For this time only, you are now going to be asked to:

text.name: FirstLaunchFolder
text.value: Select the main folder of the corpus

text.name: FirstLaunchMain
text.value: the main folder, not some article folder

text.name: EditorArticle
text.tooltip: Name of the origial editor of this article

text.name: EditorCurrent
text.tooltip: Name of the current editor (you)

text.name: NerDetails
text.tooltip: Parameters of the considered NER tool

text.name: ArticleNumber
text.tooltip: Rank of the article in the considered corpus

text.name: Position
text.tooltip: Position of the carret in the text, expressed in characters
